npmPackage.name: @joshuaavalon/gatsby-remark-prismjs
npmPackage.description: Adds syntax highlighting to code blocks at build time using PrismJS

childMarkdownRemark.html:
@joshuaavalon/gatsby-remark-prismjs

Fork of gatsby-remark-prismjs. Rewritten in TypeScript and fixed some bugs.

Use as your own risk.
